typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		HIRE_DATE as string,
		JOB_ID as string,
		SALARY as string,
		COMMISSION_PCT as string,
		MANAGER_ID as string,
		DEPARTMENT_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['empsource','processed'],
	modifiedAfter: (toTimestamp(addDays(currentDate(),-2))),
	modifiedBefore: (toTimestamp(addDays(currentDate(),0))),
	wildcardPaths:['*.csv']) ~> sourceNewEmpFiles
source(output(
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		HIRE_DATE as string,
		JOB_ID as string,
		SALARY as string,
		COMMISSION_PCT as string,
		MANAGER_ID as string,
		DEPARTMENT_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceEmp
sourceEmp aggregate() ~> getmaxid
